## üóÇÔ∏è How to Create a Thread in DOT

üöÄ Open the DOT App from the browser extension or desktop app.

üí¨ Click ‚ÄúStart a Thread‚Äù to begin collaborating with your team.

üìù Name your thread to clearly define the topic.

‚ú® Highlight important words or phrases to emphasize key points.

üìä Create tables to organize information when needed.

üìé Attach documents to share files with your team.

üòä Add emojis to express emotions and make your message more engaging.
